title: Kayle and Morgana are Vastaya?
body: The varied examples of Vastaya including Marai {{champion:267}}, landing birdlike {{champion:498}} and {{champion:497}} have led me to this thought. I suppose {{champion:10}} and {{champion:25}}'s ancestry must be an airborn kind of bird so that they can incessantly fly, unlike {{champion:497}} and {{champion:498}} who can fly only in a short duration. Making these angels be one kind of Vastaya may be the most appropriate possibility for their upcoming updated lore. Still, I'd like them as Angel rather than put them among the Vastaya. What do you think?

replies.body: I'm hoping they remain otherworldly angel people. Not every champion has to be blobbed together into different factions like with the whole Shurima thing. Malphite in particular is someone I hope they keep extraterrestial.
He's quite literally the definition of terrestrial.
